name: tensamin
description: True E2EE, decentralized messages. Open source and privacy first.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -r ../dist/* ./build/ && electron-forge make
scripts.build:git: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -r ../dist/* ./build/ && electron-forge make --targets @electron-forge/maker-deb
scripts.build:win: powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path build | Out-Null; Copy-Item ..\dist\* .\build\ -Recurse -Force; electron-forge make"
